Task
----------

 A task is the archetypal action.


| Kind             | Concerns   |
| ---------------- | ---------- |
| task  |            |

#### Structure
| Attributes    | JSON Key      | Type          |
| ------------- | ------------- | ------------- |

| CreatedAt | created_at | datetime |
| UpdatedAt | updated_at | datetime |
| Name | name | string |

| EndTime | end_time | datetime |
